title: Fort Hood Purple Heart Ceremony Honors Survivors Of 2009 Shooting
teaser: The military handed out nearly 50 awards Friday at Fort Hood in Texas. They were for the dozens of people who survived a deadly shooting rampage on the Army post in 2009. The Purple Hearts and Defense of Freedom medals came after years of lobbying.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
